Database Controller API Reference¶

Database controller providing high-level CRUD operations for users, groups, and events. This module abstracts SQLAlchemy interactions and exposes a simple API for authentication systems, group management, and event handling.

class db.db_controller.DBController¶

Bases: object

High-level interface to the application’s database, wrapping SQLAlchemy models and sessions to perform user, group, and event operations.

add_user(username: str, email: str, password_hash: str, access_level='user')¶

Create and persist a new user.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – The desired username.

  • email (str) – User’s email address.

  • password_hash (str) – Pre-hashed password.

  • access_level (str) – Permission role (default: "user").

Returns:

(True, User) on success, otherwise (False, message).

Return type:

tuple

add_user_to_event(user_id: int, event_id: int)¶

Add a user as an event attendee.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – User identifier.

  • event_id (int) – Event identifier.

Returns:

(True, message) or (False, message).

add_user_to_group(user_id: int, group_id: int)¶

Add a user to a group.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – User identifier.

  • group_id (int) – Group identifier.

Returns:

(True, message) or (False, message).

Return type:

tuple

close()¶

Close the active database session.

create_event(event_name: str, description: str, event_time)¶

Create a new event.

Parameters:

  • event_name (str) – Title of the event.

  • description (str) – Event description.

  • event_time (datetime) – Scheduled time.

Returns:

(True, Event).

create_group(group_name: str, owner_id: int = None)¶

Create a new group.

Parameters:

  • group_name (str) – Name of the group.

  • owner_id (int) – Optional ID of the group’s owner.

Returns:

(True, Group) or (False, message).

Return type:

tuple

delete_event(event_id: int)¶

Delete an event.

Parameters:

event_id (int) – Event identifier.

Returns:

(True, message) or (False, message).

delete_group(group_id)¶

Delete a group and its membership links.

Parameters:

group_id (int) – Group identifier.

Returns:

(True, message) or (False, message).

get_all_events()¶

Retrieve all events.

Returns:

List of events.

get_all_groups()¶

Retrieve all groups.

Returns:

List of groups.

Return type:

list

get_all_users()¶

Get all user entries.

Returns:

List of all User objects.

Return type:

list

get_attendees_from_event(event_id: int)¶

Get all users attending a specific event.

Parameters:

event_id (int) – Event identifier.

Returns:

List of attendees or None.

get_event_by_id(event_id: int)¶

Retrieve an event by ID.

Parameters:

event_id (int) – Event identifier.

Returns:

Event object or None.

get_events_from_user(user_id: int)¶

Retrieve events associated with a user.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – User identifier.

Returns:

List of events or None.

get_group_by_id(group_id: int)¶

Retrieve a group by ID.

Parameters:

group_id (int) – Group identifier.

Returns:

Group object or None.

get_groups_by_member(user_id)¶

Retrieve groups a user is a member of.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – User identifier.

Returns:

List of groups.

get_groups_by_owner(owner_id)¶

Retrieve groups that belong to a specific owner.

Parameters:

owner_id (int) – Owner identifier.

Returns:

List of groups.

get_groups_from_user(user_id: int)¶

Retrieve groups that a user belongs to.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – User identifier.

Returns:

List of groups or None.

get_user_by_email(email: str)¶

Retrieve a user by email.

Parameters:

email (str) – Email address.

Returns:

User object or None.

get_user_by_id(user_id: int)¶

Retrieve a user by database ID.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – User ID.

Returns:

User object or None.

get_user_by_username(username: str)¶

Retrieve a user by username.

Parameters:

username (str) – Username to query.

Returns:

User object or None.

get_users_from_group(group_id: int)¶

Retrieve users that belong to a specific group.

Parameters:

group_id (int) – Group identifier.

Returns:

List of users or None.

remove_user_from_group(user_id, group_id)¶

Remove a user from a group.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – User identifier.

  • group_id (int) – Group identifier.

Returns:

(True, message) or (False, message).

set_event_attendees(event_id: int, new_attendee_ids: list[int])¶

Replace all attendees of an event.

Parameters:

  • event_id (int) – Event identifier.

  • new_attendee_ids (list[int]) – User IDs to assign.

Returns:

(True, message).

update_event(event_id: int, updates: dict)¶

Update an event’s fields.

Parameters:

  • event_id (int) – Event identifier.

  • updates (dict) – Field/value mappings.

Returns:

(True, event) or (False, message).

update_group_name(group_id, new_name)¶

Rename a group.

Parameters:

  • group_id (int) – Group identifier.

  • new_name (str) – New group name.

Returns:

(True, group) or (False, message).

update_user(user_id: int, updates: dict)¶

Update fields of an existing user.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – User ID.

  • updates (dict) – Mapping of field names to new values.

Returns:

(True, user) on success, otherwise (False, message).

Return type:

tuple
